name: White and black detective
description:
In the game, you will play a "super" detective role to the manor to investigate a missing case. As you investigate more deeply, your questions are more and more. Broken frame, stained bronze statue and a closed door, all of this is waiting for your adventure.
     Day and night switch, murderer and detective conversion, you will get two different game experience. Unique detective reasoning system to create a different game outcome, the scoring system will give you an intelligent score on the performance of the game, you dare to drying out their own score?
    * Beautiful realistic scenes
    * Interlocking puzzles
    * Logic compact plot
    * Will take you into a nervous, horrible manor
